name: Flying Flair Airlines ACROSS CANADA! 737-800 Edmonton to Toronto
description:
Back in January, I had the chance to try out Flair Airlines on one of their longer flights, from Edmonton to Toronto, with their 737-800.

I've only ever flown with Flair on shorter flights (less than 2 hours) before this, so I was curious to see what they had to offer on this 3.5 hour flight! 

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

DISCLAIMER: The ticket for this flight was paid for by Flair Airlines. This video was not pre-approved by Flair Airlines and all opinions are my own.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

 SOCIAL MEDIA

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Airline: Flair Airlines (F8/FLE)
Aircraft: Boeing 737-86J (B738)
Flight Number: F8101
Seat: 16A
Livery: New (2019)
Engines: 2x CFMI CFM56-7B24 
Registration: C-FFLJ
Route: Edmonton (YEG) - Toronto-Pearson (YYZ)
Callsign: FLAIR 101
Runway used: 12 (YEG) - 23 (YYZ)
Date filmed: January 2020

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Outro song: "Take Flight" by Nyhtian: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bCTTwQ_269c
